title: Equestrian at the 2006 Asian Games – Team dressage
text: Team dressage <a href="equestrianism">equestrian</a> at the <a href="2006%20Asian%20Games">2006 Asian Games</a> was held in Equestrian Dressage Arena, <a href="Doha">Doha</a>, <a href="Qatar">Qatar</a> on December 4, 2006. The event consisted of one round, Young Riders (YR) team test.
